name: Mint
0:
”Alexa, Ask Mint to open budgets”
”Alexa, Ask Mint to get transactions”
”Alexa, Ask Mint to show me my trends”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mint
des: The Mint Skill is an awesome companion to Mint and mint.com , that helps you get more done, faster, using Alexa on your phone. Try it with a pair of Echo Buds, Echo Frames, or an Alexa hands-free phone!Note: This skill is meant to be used on your phone.With this skill, Alexa can help you: Open Budgets, Get transactions, Show me my trends. For a reminder of a few things you can do with the Skill, you can ask, “Alexa, ask Mint what can I say”
